item.title: Scala CI/CD with Github Actions and Heroku
item.description: We’ll here’s a quick guide on how to continuously run sbt test on every pull request, and after merging deploy it to Heroku. And we’ do this all within the comfort of GitHub, using their automation tool called GitHub Actions.
